sentences.sContent: In fact, the superorganism scenario is in a sense just the cosmic flip side of the diagnosis offered by Carr and other techno-skeptics.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, the superorganism scenario is in a sense just the cosmic flip side of the diagnosis offered by Carr and other techno-skeptics.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，在卡尔和其他科技怀疑论者的诊断里，超个体的假设在某种意义上只不过是宇宙的反面。

trans.tranCn: [生]超个体(指群居昆虫等的群体)
